message.body: Hey John, how have you been?
Hey! I'm okay. Really bored at work right now, and my plans tonight got cancelled.
How are you doing? Do anything fun since finals?
Aww poo, sorry about your lack of fun plans! I haven't had time for fun in the last 11 days. Phillies work every night, plus school work, plus dog-sittin
g the chihuahuas down the street. They are evil.
Man, you've been really busy. You doing anything this weekend?
Also, I didn't know school started for you already.
Is it for teaching? Or did your class start already?
You should take Chase over with you when dogsit~
It's a summer grad class. Chase would give those dogs a heart attack! Haha
Dunno about the weekend yet. I still have work and homework. :(

Homework and work, destroyers of fun. :[
Is your class enjoyable?

Sam, I can now make hardboiled eggs without fail.
Yeah!
